about_the_game:
A colony ship crashlands on a hostile and mysterious alien planet. Think fast and fight to stay alive, along with a surviving group of stranded children, as you guide them in the search for their parents. Overseen by an insentient AI, you will uncover long-forgotten secrets behind the planet and reveal the cause that crashed your ship. Be invested in the characters and help them live, coping with moments of tension as all your party is faced with impossible challenges.

LEARNING TO SURVIVE COULD BE YOUR BEST BET


The scorching sun will force you to seek shelter, but the shelter you'll find is not safe. Adapt so the planet won't get you.

THERE IS ALWAYS A DEEPER TRUTH


Uncover the mystery behind a conspiracy involving the colony ship. Solve puzzles in the ruins of an ancient alien civilization once inhabiting the planet and unveil the truth behind its disappearance. Decide on the fate of the remaining colonists.

BOND WITH THOSE LIKE YOURSELF


You will manage the main cast of 6 characters (including your avatar character). Experience heartwarming moments between the children or gut-wrenching drama as it unfolds in the story. Live a story that will emotionally deliver both highs and lows.

ADAPT FOR COMBAT


Deal with an intense combat system with interactions between your party to promote using the group of characters adaptively. A primer and detonator combo system and a dynamic character class system will keep the combat exciting throughout the game, allowing you to customize the classes for each member before a mission.

DECIDE UPON AND CHANGE YOUR ODDS OF SURVIVAL


Altering the group's connections will affect the state of the children in combat depending on how they feel about each other.

WOULD YOU DO IT DIFFERENTLY?


High replay value, choose what kind of character to roleplay as, influence other characters, and make decisions that affect the course of the story. Determine the ending out of the multiple available ones.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 ( 2048 MB) / Radeon R9 390X (8192 MB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K (4 * 4000) or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (6 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 (8192 MB) / Radeon RX 5700 (8192 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Delve into a psychological sci-fi shooter, masterfully leading a team of 5 characters to harmonious combat brilliance. Navigate heartwarming connections and intense drama, unlocking enhanced combat capabilities to conquer hostile alien fauna and unveil the mystery behind parental disappearance.
